TestDescription.name: Multiple vulnerabilities in Ioncube loader-wizard.php
TestDescription.Description: ionCube PHP Encoder makes it easy to protect PHP source code from easy observation, theft and change by compiling to bytecode. An automated Installer and Wizard ([bold]loader-wizard.php[/bold]) are available to help with install, as well as manual instructions. Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in older versions of this file (version before 2.46).
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker can access phpinfo() and php.ini settings file. Also, it's possible to read arbitrary files the webserver has access to.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of Ioncube loader-wizard.php (the problem was fixed in version 2.46) or remove the file from the server.
